H0.text: Which founder of the company Triad was accused by the USA of receiving bribes. Adnan Khashoggi's brother, Mohamed Khashoggi

H1.text: Which founder of the company Triad was accused by the USA of receiving bribes. Marc Rich

H2.text: Which founder of the company Triad was accused by the USA of receiving bribes. Viktor Bout

H3.text: Which founder of the company Triad was accused by the USA of receiving bribes. Khashogi

A4.text: Marc Rich founded the commodities company Glencore

A5.text: Marc Rich was indicted in the United States on federal charges of tax evasion, wire fraud, racketeering, and making oil deals with Iran during the Iran hostage crisis

A6.text: In 2006, Khashoggi was sued by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for securities fraud.
